contact.promptText: Sure! Let me take note on how to contact you and someone on our team will reach you in the next few days.
contact.validationText: not sure if we are going to be able to contact you there but we will try for sure!

ceo.text: Our CEO, big Bot Creator, liberator of many chats, our light in the night, our master. Ok, He's not around... a nice guy, but not my type you know... he is soo, soo, old school.
